channel.title: CVE Feed for Yokogawa Electric Corporation -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Yokogawa Electric Corporation -- all products

item.title: CVE-2022-23401|2024-08-03T03:43:45.875Z -- yokogawa%20electric%20corporation -- centum%20cs%203000
item.description: The following Yokogawa Electric products contain insecure DLL loading issues. CENTUM CS 3000 versions from R3.08.10 to R3.09.00, CENTUM VP versions from R4.01.00 to R4.03.00, from R5.01.00 to R5.04.20, and from R6.01.00 to R6.08.00, Exaopc versions from R3.72.00 to R3.79.00.

item.title: CVE-2022-21194|2024-08-03T02:31:59.724Z -- yokogawa%20electric%20corporation -- centum%20vp
item.description: The following Yokogawa Electric products do not change the passwords of the internal Windows accounts from the initial configuration: CENTUM VP versions from R5.01.00 to R5.04.20 and versions from R6.01.00 to R6.08.0, Exaopc versions from R3.72.00 to R3.79.00.

item.title: CVE-2022-21808|2024-08-03T02:53:36.258Z -- yokogawa%20electric%20corporation -- centum%20cs%203000
item.description: Path traversal vulnerability exists in CAMS for HIS Server contained in the following Yokogawa Electric products: CENTUM CS 3000 versions from R3.08.10 to R3.09.00, CENTUM VP versions from R4.01.00 to R4.03.00, from R5.01.00 to R5.04.20, and from R6.01.00 to R6.08.00, Exaopc versions from R3.72.00 to R3.79.00.

item.title: CVE-2022-30707|2024-08-03T06:56:13.588Z -- yokogawa%20electric%20corporation -- cams%20for%20his
item.description: Violation of secure design principles exists in the communication of CAMS for HIS. Affected products and versions are CENTUM series where LHS4800 is installed (CENTUM CS 3000 and CENTUM CS 3000 Small R3.08.10 to R3.09.00), CENTUM series where CAMS function is used (CENTUM VP, CENTUM VP Small, and CENTUM VP Basic R4.01.00 to R4.03.00), CENTUM series regardless of the use of CAMS function (CENTUM VP, CENTUM VP Small, and CENTUM VP Basic R5.01.00 to R5.04.20 and R6.01.00 to R6.09.00), Exaopc R3.72.00 to R3.80.00 (only if NTPF100-S6 'For CENTUM VP Support CAMS for HIS' is installed), B/M9000 CS R5.04.01 to R5.05.01, and B/M9000 VP R6.01.01 to R8.03.01). If an adjacent attacker successfully compromises a computer using CAMS for HIS software, they can use credentials from the compromised machine to access data from another machine using CAMS for HIS software. This can lead to a disabling of CAMS for HIS software functions on any affected machines, or information disclosure/alteration.

item.title: CVE-2022-22145|2024-08-03T03:07:48.938Z -- yokogawa%20electric%20corporation -- centum%20cs%203000
item.description: CAMS for HIS Log Server contained in the following Yokogawa Electric products is vulnerable to uncontrolled resource consumption. CENTUM CS 3000 versions from R3.08.10 to R3.09.00, CENTUM VP versions from R4.01.00 to R4.03.00, from R5.01.00 to R5.04.20, from R6.01.00 to R6.08.00, Exaopc versions from R3.72.00 to R3.79.00.

item.title: CVE-2022-22151|2024-08-03T03:07:48.306Z -- yokogawa%20electric%20corporation -- centum%20cs%203000
item.description: CAMS for HIS Log Server contained in the following Yokogawa Electric products fails to properly neutralize log outputs: CENTUM CS 3000 versions from R3.08.10 to R3.09.00, CENTUM VP versions from R4.01.00 to R4.03.00, from R5.01.00 to R5.04.20, and from R6.01.00 to R6.08.00, and Exaopc versions from R3.72.00 to R3.79.00.

item.title: CVE-2022-22141|2024-08-03T03:07:48.318Z -- yokogawa%20electric%20corporation -- centum%20cs%203000
item.description: 'Long-term Data Archive Package' service implemented in the following Yokogawa Electric products creates some named pipe with imporper ACL configuration. CENTUM CS 3000 versions from R3.08.10 to R3.09.00, CENTUM VP versions from R4.01.00 to R4.03.00, from R5.01.00 to R5.04.20, and from R6.01.00 to R6.08.00, Exaopc versions from R3.72.00 to R3.79.00.

item.title: CVE-2022-29519|2024-08-03T06:26:05.949Z -- yokogawa%20electric%20corporation -- stardom%20controller
item.description: Cleartext transmission of sensitive information vulnerability exists in STARDOM FCN Controller and FCJ Controller R1.01 to R4.31, which may allow an adjacent attacker to login the affected products and alter device configuration settings or tamper with device firmware.

item.title: CVE-2022-23402|2024-08-03T03:43:45.995Z -- yokogawa%20electric%20corporation -- centum%20vp
item.description: The following Yokogawa Electric products hard-code the password for CAMS server applications: CENTUM VP versions from R5.01.00 to R5.04.20 and versions from R6.01.00 to R6.08.00, Exaopc versions from R3.72.00 to R3.79.00

item.title: CVE-2022-22729|2024-08-03T03:21:49.121Z -- yokogawa%20electric%20corporation -- centum%20cs%203000
item.description: CAMS for HIS Server contained in the following Yokogawa Electric products improperly authenticate the receiving packets. The authentication may be bypassed via some crafted packets: CENTUM CS 3000 versions from R3.08.10 to R3.09.00, CENTUM VP versions from R4.01.00 to R4.03.00, from R5.01.00 to R5.04.20, and from R6.01.00 to R6.08.00, and Exaopc versions from R3.72.00 to R3.79.00.

item.title: CVE-2022-22148|2024-08-03T03:07:49.688Z -- yokogawa%20electric%20corporation -- centum%20cs%203000
item.description: 'Root Service' service implemented in the following Yokogawa Electric products creates some named pipe with improper ACL configuration. CENTUM CS 3000 versions from R3.08.10 to R3.09.00, CENTUM VP versions from R4.01.00 to R4.03.00, from R5.01.00 to R5.04.20, and from R6.01.00 to R6.08.00, Exaopc versions from R3.72.00 to R3.79.00.

item.title: CVE-2022-30997|2024-08-03T07:03:40.234Z -- yokogawa%20electric%20corporation -- stardom%20controller
item.description: Use of hard-coded credentials vulnerability exists in STARDOM FCN Controller and FCJ Controller R4.10 to R4.31, which may allow an attacker with an administrative privilege to read/change configuration settings or update the controller with tampered firmware.

item.title: CVE-2022-27188|2024-08-03T05:25:31.127Z -- yokogawa%20electric%20corporation -- centum%20vp%20series%20with%20vp6e5150%28graphic%20builder%29%20installed%20and%20b%2Fm9000%20vp
item.description: OS command injection vulnerability exists in CENTUM VP R4.01.00 to R4.03.00, CENTUM VP Small R4.01.00 to R4.03.00, CENTUM VP Basic R4.01.00 to R4.03.00, and B/M9000 VP R6.01.01 to R6.03.02, which may allow an attacker who can access the computer where the affected product is installed to execute an arbitrary OS command by altering a file generated using Graphic Builder.

item.title: CVE-2022-32284|2024-08-03T07:39:51.055Z -- yokogawa%20electric%20corporation -- communication%20module%20for%20wide%20area%20communication%20router%20%28for%20aw810d%29%20vi461
item.description: Use of insufficiently random values vulnerability exists in Vnet/IP communication module VI461 of YOKOGAWA Wide Area Communication Router (WAC Router) AW810D, which may allow a remote attacker to cause denial-of-service (DoS) condition by sending a specially crafted packet.

item.title: CVE-2022-26034|2024-08-03T04:56:37.370Z -- yokogawa%20electric%20corporation -- centum%20vp%20series%20with%20vp6e5000%28ad%20suite%20engineering%20serverfunction%29%20installed%20and%20b%2Fm9000%20vp
item.description: Improper authentication vulnerability in the communication protocol provided by AD (Automation Design) server of CENTUM VP R6.01.10 to R6.09.00, CENTUM VP Small R6.01.10 to R6.09.00, CENTUM VP Basic R6.01.10 to R6.09.00, and B/M9000 VP R8.01.01 to R8.03.01 allows an attacker to use the functions provided by AD server. This may lead to leakage or tampering of data managed by AD server.

item.title: CVE-2022-21177|2024-08-03T02:31:59.257Z -- yokogawa%20electric%20corporation -- centum%20cs%203000
item.description: There is a path traversal vulnerability in CAMS for HIS Log Server contained in the following Yokogawa Electric products: CENTUM CS 3000 versions from R3.08.10 to R3.09.00, CENTUM VP versions from R4.01.00 to R4.03.00, from R5.01.00 to R5.04.20, andfrom R6.01.00 to R6.08.00, Exaopc versions from R3.72.00 to R3.79.00.

item.title: CVE-2024-4106|2024-08-01T20:33:52.203Z -- yokogawa%20electric%20corporation -- fast%2Ftools
item.description: A vulnerability has been found in FAST/TOOLS and CI Server. The affected products have built-in accounts with no passwords set. Therefore, if the product is operated without a password set by default, an attacker can break into the affected product. The affected products and versions are as follows: FAST/TOOLS (Packages: RVSVRN, UNSVRN, HMIWEB, FTEES, HMIMOB) R9.01 to R10.04 CI Server R1.01.00 to R1.03.00

item.title: CVE-2024-4105|2024-08-01T20:33:52.203Z -- yokogawa%20electric%20corporation -- fast%2Ftools
item.description: A vulnerability has been found in FAST/TOOLS and CI Server. The affected product's WEB HMI server's function to process HTTP requests has a security flaw (Reflected XSS) that allows the execution of malicious scripts. Therefore, if a client PC with inadequate security measures accesses a product URL containing a malicious request, the malicious script may be executed on the client PC. The affected products and versions are as follows: FAST/TOOLS (Packages: RVSVRN, UNSVRN, HMIWEB, FTEES, HMIMOB) R9.01 to R10.04 CI Server R1.01.00 to R1.03.00

item.title: CVE-2024-4105|2024-06-26T17:30:23.193Z -- yokogawa%20electric%20corporation -- fast%2Ftools
item.description: A vulnerability has been found in FAST/TOOLS and CI Server. item.title: CVE-2024-5650|2024-06-17T06:21:31.387Z -- yokogawa%20electric%20corporation -- centum%20cs%203000
item.description:
DLL Hijacking vulnerability has been found in CENTUM CAMS Log server provided by Yokogawa Electric Corporation. If an attacker is somehow able to intrude into a computer that installed affected product or access to a shared folder, by replacing the DLL file with a tampered one, it is possible to execute arbitrary programs with the authority of the SYSTEM account.
The affected products and versions are as follows: CENTUM CS 3000 R3.08.10 to R3.09.50 CENTUM VP R4.01.00 to R4.03.00, R5.01.00 to R5.04.20, R6.01.00 to R6.11.10.
